text: For the commandments, “Yoʋ shall not commit adultery, Yoʋ shall not murder, Yoʋ shall not 13:9 steal, ¦ steal, Yoʋ shall not give false testimony, BYZ PCK TRsteal, Yoʋ shall not covet,” and whatever other commandments there may be, are summed up in this one command: “Yoʋ shall love yoʋr neighbor as yoʋrself.”
